name: Mjvbz
wishText: I am So grateful for having a friend like you;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.(Actually i did it)
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.(i am sorry i couldnt get a better photo of you)
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.Made with love by TomsMater(Thomas) For My Best Friend.
